speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark calling from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm fine, but I don't appreciate these calls.

speaker: Agent
text: I understand your frustration. I'm calling about your overdue balance with your account.

speaker: Customer
text: I've already requested to be put on the do not call list.

speaker: Agent
text: I apologize for the inconvenience. Let me confirm that your number will be marked as do not call.

speaker: Customer
text: I really hope this works. I don't want to hear from you again.

speaker: Agent
text: Absolutely, I will ensure it's updated right away. Thank you for your patience.
